sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"连接，结合，联合"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: join, combine, unite, connect, link, attach, couple, associate, relate
means: join ： 侧重把原来不相连接的物紧密地连接在一起，但仍可再分开。也指把分散的人或几个部分的人联合起来，或加入到某团体中去。
combine ： 指两个或两个以上的人或物结合在一起。
unite ： 指联合、团结、结合在一起，构成一个整体。
connect ： 指两事物在某一点上相连接，但彼此又保持独立。
link ： 指连环式的连接，或用接合物或其它方式连接，还可指一事物与另一事物的联系或关系。
attach ： 指把局部连接在整体上，小的接在大的上面，活动的接在固定的上面。
couple ： 专指连接两件东西，或把事物成对进行连接。
associate ： 指人与人友好和平、平等地联合在一起；用于物时，指两事物因历史或其它原因，很自然被人们联系在一起，即产生联想。
relate ： 指人与人有亲戚或婚烟关系；也指人或物之间尚存的实际或假想的联系。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin relat- 'brought back', from the verb referre (see refer)

encyclopedia.content: SEO指令 查询与某网页特别相关有网页。 格式为：relate:你的域名。 百度词典释义 及物动词vt. 1. 讲，叙述[(+to)] To him we related our troubles, asking his advice. 我们向他讲述了我们的困难，请他指导。 2. 使有联系[(+to/with)] Can you relate what happened in your childhood to your present state of mind? 你能否把你童年时的遭遇同目前的心境相联起来？ 不及物动词vi. 1. 有关，涉及[(+to)] I don't know to what t

entry.def: If something relates to a particular subject, it concerns that subject.

example.ex: Other recommendations relate to the details of how such data is stored...
example.tran: 其他建议涉及此类信息储存方面的一些细节。

example.ex: It does not matter whether the problem you have relates to food, drink, smoking or just living...
example.tran: 不管你的问题是由食物、饮料、吸烟引起，或仅仅是生活引起，都无关紧要。

entry.def: The way that two things relate, or the way that one thing relates to another, is the sort of connection that exists between them.

example.ex: More studies will be required before we know what the functions of these genes are and whether they relate to each other...
example.tran: 要弄清这些基因的功能以及它们彼此之间是否关联，我们还需要开展更多的研究。

example.ex: Cornell University offers a course that investigates how language relates to particular cultural codes...
example.tran: 康奈尔大学开设了一门研究语言与特定文化符号之间如何关联的课程。

entry.def: If you can relate to someone, you can understand how they feel or behave so that you are able to communicate with them or deal with them easily.

example.ex: He is unable to relate to other people...
example.tran: 他无法理解他人的想法。

example.ex: I think it is important for children to have brothers and sisters they can relate to...
example.tran: 我认为对孩子们来讲有可以相互理解沟通的兄弟姐妹很重要。

entry.def: If you relate a story, you tell it.

example.ex: There were officials to whom he could relate the whole story...
example.tran: 有一些官员会听他讲述整个故事。

example.ex: She related her tale of living rough.
example.tran: 她讲述了自己艰苦谋生的故事。

means.word_mean: 1. make a logical or causal connection;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot connect these two pieces of evidence in my mind"
"I cannot relate these events at all"

means.word_mean: 2. have to do with or be relevant to;

sentences.sentence: "There were lots of questions referring to her talk"
"My remark pertained to your earlier comments"

means.word_mean: 5. have or establish a relationship to;

stems_affixes.word_buile: elate[v.使兴高采烈,使得意]+ion表名词→n.得意,振奋
cor共同+relate发生关系→使相互关联
e出+late拿出,带出,放→拿出情绪→高兴

stems_affixes.value_cn: 叙述, 讲, 使联系, 发生关系
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+late拿出,带出,放→回放→叙述, 讲
sub在下面+late拿出,带出,放→放到下面→否定,消除
trans变换+late拿出,带出,放→交换拿出→翻译

Sentence.sentence: a political scientist at the University of Colorado, Boulder, who studies disaster trends, said the Forum's report was "a methodological embarrassment" because there was no way to distinguish deaths or economic losses related to human-driven global warming amid the much larger losses resulting from the growth in populations and economic development in vulnerable (易受伤害的) regions.
Another aspect of social comparison in the counseling context relates to a technique known as normalizing.
The second related criticism is that Google's scanning of books is actually illegal.

The problem relates to the way data is stored on large websites: While your personal computer only keeps one copy of a file, large-scale services like Facebook rely on what are called content delivery networks to manage data and distribution.

means.word_mean: 联系，(把…)联系起来，使有联系

sentences.en: His remarks didn't relate to the topic under discussion.
sentences.cn: 他说的话与讨论的问题无关。

sentences.en: I can't relate those two ideas.
sentences.cn: 我很难把这两种想法联系起来。

sentences.en: It is difficult to relate the two cases.
sentences.cn: 要把那两件事联系起来是很困难的。

sentences.en: Can you relate what happened in your childhood to your present state of mind?
sentences.cn: 你能将童年的经历与现在的心情联系起来吗?

sentences.en: It is difficult to relate these results with any known cause.
sentences.cn: 很难把结果与任何已知原因联系起来。

sentences.en: Then he related what had passed between them.
sentences.cn: 然后他讲述他们之间发生的情况。

sentences.en: He related some amusing stories in his childhood to his children.
sentences.cn: 他向孩子们述说了他少年时代的一些趣事。

sentences.en: "This guy came by trying to sell me a talking dog for $10," related the bartender.
sentences.cn: 酒吧间男招待说：“那个家伙走过来想卖以10美元的价格卖给我一只会说话的狗。”

jushi.english: The author saw it all happening so, and therefore related it.
jushi.chinese: 作者目睹了事情发生的一切,于是就详细地叙述它发生的过程。

jushi.english: I can't relate those two ideas.
jushi.chinese: 我很难把这两种想法联系起来。

jushi.english: It is difficult to relate these results with any known cause.
jushi.chinese: 很难把结果与任何已知原因联系起来。
